name: Mikasa
acquisitionMethod: Limited Build in event "The Return of the War God"

1.name: Reborn Combined Fleet Flagship
1.description: When receiving damage, 4.5% (12%) chance to reduce damage taken by 50%. When sortied as the flagship, increases allied Sakura Empire (IJN) ships' firepower and reload by 5% (20%).

2.name: T-Cross Formation
2.description: When firing the main gun, 30% (60%) chance to activate: For 8 seconds, increase fleet's battlecruiser and battleship damage dealt by 5% (20%).

1.name: Mikasa
1.description: Second ship of Shikishima class battleships, Mikasa.

2.name: Style of the Sakura Capital
2.description: While organizing my storage, I found something nostalgic. Erm... "Preparations complete, join me for a new journey"- Commander, how was it?

3.name: Sakura Viewing Day
3.description: It's about time for the Sakura blooming season, the flow of time is fast... Ahem, Commander, how about flower viewing with me?

limitBreak.tier1: Main Gun Mount +1 / Main Gun Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier2: Secondary Gun Mount +1 / Main Gun Efficiency +10%
limitBreak.tier3: Main Gun Mount +1 / Main Gun Efficiency +15%

1.chinese: 敷岛级战列舰四番舰—三笠
1.japanese: 敷島型戦艦四番艦・三笠

2.chinese: 我是敷岛级战列舰四号舰，“六六舰队”的最后一艘战列舰三笠号。在我担任舰队总旗舰时，获得了那场令吾等威名响彻世界的大海战的胜利—
2.chineseTL: I'm the Shikishima-class battleship, the last first-class battleship of the Six-Six Fleet Program, Mikasa. As flagship of the Combined Fleet, I brought about a great naval victory that spread the name of my country to the ends of the Earth.
2.japanese: 我は敷島型戦艦、六六艦隊計画の最後の一級戦艦・三笠である。連合艦隊の総旗艦を勤め、我が国の名を世界に轟かせたかの大海戦において、大勝利を齎したのだぞ
2.japaneseTL: I am Mikasa, the Shikishima-class battleship and the last first-class battleship of the Six-Six Fleet Program. As the flagship of the Combined Fleet, I brought about a great naval victory that spread the name of my country to the ends of the Earth.

3.chinese: 我乃从枪林弹雨中脱围而出，将胜利与威名带回祖国的、重樱舰队旗舰——前无畏舰、三笠！
3.chineseTL: Emerging from a curtain of smoke and fire, I brought victory and glory to my home country, Pre-dreadnought battleship, Mikasa!
3.japanese: 我、弾雨硝煙（だんうしょうえん）を振り払い、勝利を以て祖国に威光栄誉（いこうえいよ）をもたらす者なりーー重桜艦隊旗艦・前弩級戦艦三笠、推して参る！
3.japaneseTL: I, who emerged from a curtain of smoke and fire, brough great victory and glory back to my home country - Sakura Empire Combined Fleet flagship, Pre-dreadnought Mikasa, pushing forward!

4.chinese: 在重拾往昔的荣光前，无论如何都决不能停下前进的步伐！
4.chineseTL: Until we regain our past glory, we must continue to push forward at all costs!
4.japanese: 過ぎた栄光を再び手にするまで、勇往邁進（ゆうおうまいしん）を止めてはならん！
4.japaneseTL: Until we regain the glory we once had, we must continue to press forward!

5.chinese: 身为旗舰，当然要身居最前线指挥战斗，这是理所当然的吧！
5.chineseTL: As the flagship, I must command the fleet from the utmost frontline. That's naturally how it should be!
5.japanese: 旗艦たる者、最前線で指揮を執るべき。当然であろう
5.japaneseTL: Flagships are the vessels that should issue commands from the frontlines. It is only natural.

6.chinese: 对马的胜利可不是偶然喔
6.chineseTL: The victory at Tsushima cannot be attributed to mere luck.
6.japanese: 対馬の勝利は、偶然ですますことはあるまい
6.japaneseTL: The victory at Tsushima cannot be attributed to mere luck.

7.chinese: 皇家料理？不……那种东西那时候我就吃够了——
7.chineseTL: Royal cuisine? No, I had enough of it back then.
7.japanese: ロイヤルの料理？いや、流石に飽きたぞ
7.japaneseTL: Royal cuisine? No thank you, I have had enough of it.

8.chinese: 飞在天上的那个，唔，是叫做”肥鸡“的玩具吗？
8.chineseTL: Those things flying in the sky, hmm... Are those the toys they call "Fat Chicken"?
8.japanese: 空に飛んでいる、うん、それ…たしか「ヒコウキ」という、玩具の類だな…違う？
8.japaneseTL: Those things flying in the sky, hmm, if I recall correctly... they are a kind of toy called "Aircraft"… Correct?

9.chinese: 一个人无论多么努力都难免偶尔松懈，这种时候进行进谏就是我的职责
9.chineseTL: Even the most hardworking person can't avoid times when he slacks off. During those moments providing remonstrance is my duty.
9.japanese: どんなに努力する者も時には怠ける。そうならぬよう諌めるのは我の勤めなのだ
9.japaneseTL: Even the most diligent of workers can be lazy sometimes. It's my duty to keep them from becoming so.

10.chinese: 想找我做胜利后庆功舞会的舞伴！？真没办法～
10.chineseTL: You want me as your dance partner for the victory celebration ball?! It can't be helped then~
10.japanese: 祝宴会のダンス相手が所望か？……しょ、しょうがないな…
10.japaneseTL: Are you inviting me to be your dance partner at the banquet?... I-it can't be helped then...

11.chinese: 今天我来制定任务完成计划？那就……吾——唔，干嘛捂住我的嘴！
11.chineseTL: You want me to formulate the mission plans today? In that case...... h-hmm-hm, why are you shutting my mouth!
11.japanese: うむ、本日の艦隊計画は我が立てるのか？では……我が国の興廃、この一戦に…うぐぅ！…なぜ我に言わせんのだ！
11.japaneseTL: I see, so you want me to create today's plans for the fleet? In that case… the fate of our country rests on this bat- Urgh! Why won't you let me finish?!

12.chinese: 那么，赶快去掠——领取胜利的果实吧！
12.chineseTL: Alright, let's pillag-... I mean, receive the fruits of victory!
12.japanese: ふむ、では勝利の果実を奪いとーーではなく、受取るのだ！
12.japaneseTL: Very well, let's pillag- I mean, receive the fruits of our victory!

13.chinese: 奖章与荣耀我永不嫌多……嘿嘿～
13.chineseTL: I can't ever have enough medals and awards... Hehehe
13.japanese: 勲章と恩賞はいくらあっても……えへへー♪
13.japaneseTL: No matter how many medals and awards I get… (Giggle)♪

14.chinese: 很好！战争的天平正在一点一点朝我们这边倾斜！
14.chineseTL: Very well! The balance of this conflict is slowly tipping in our favor!
14.japanese: 良いぞ！戦いの天秤は我に傾きつつあるのだ！
14.japaneseTL: Excellent! The balance of this conflict is leaning in our favor!

15.chinese: 如果后勤匮乏，再强大的舰队也会成为乌合之众
15.chineseTL: Without well organized logistics, even the mightiest fleet becomes nothing but an unruly mob!
15.japanese: 兵站輜重（へいたんしちょう）がなければ、いくら堅艦巨砲（けんかんきょほう）でも、烏合の衆にすぎない！
15.japaneseTL: Without communication and logistics, no matter how many warships or how powerful the weaponry you assemble, they are but an unruly mob!

16.chinese: 只有战场才能分辨“优秀”与“平庸”
16.chineseTL: It is only in the battlefield, where "Excellence" and "Mediocrity" can be distinguished.
16.japanese: 優秀も平凡も、戦場でのみ見分けがつく
16.japaneseTL: Only on the battlefield can excellence and mediocrity be distinguished.

17.chineseTL: For the future of the Sakura Empire!
17.japanese: 我が国の興廃、この一戦にあり！
17.japaneseTL: The fate of our country rests on this battle!

18.chineseTL: Prosperity through righteousness, as mandated by the heavens!
18.japanese: 大いに亨りて以て正しきは、天の道なり！
18.japaneseTL: By justice we shall prosper, such is the way of the heavens.

19.chineseTL: So this is like the Battle of Dan-no-ura...
19.japanese: 壇ノ浦の如しとは、こういうことか……
19.japaneseTL: So this is what it must feel like to experience the battle of Dan-no-ura...

20.chineseTL: Everyone present, join hands in one mind!
20.japanese: 各員、奮励努力（ふんれいどりょく）せよ！

21.chinese: 不要慌张，胜负还没有尘埃落定！
21.chineseTL: Do not panic, the outcome has yet to be decided!
21.japanese: 慌てるな！まだ勝敗はこれからだ！
21.japaneseTL: Do not panic! The battle has yet to be decided!

22.japanese: ショウワ生まれのばかぁ！

23.chinese: 见不到过去的同伴，确实有些……但——为了仍旧幼稚的后辈们，我可得打起精神才行！
23.chineseTL: Being unable to meet my companions from the past, it feels a bit... However, for my still inexperience juniors, I have to uphold expectations!
23.japanese: 同期の仲間に会えないのは確かに……だがーーまだ半人前な後輩たちのためにも、しっかりしないとな！
23.japaneseTL: It is true that I'm unable to meet my friends from my own time… However, I need to be steadfast for the sake of all my inexperienced juniors!

24.chinese: 如果没有想好如何结束战争，就不该挑起战争！
24.chineseTL: If one hasn't thought of how to end a war, then he should never start one.
24.japanese: 戦争の終わらせ方を決めれないのなら、戦争を起こすべきではない！
24.japaneseTL: One who cannot decide how to end a fight should not start one!

25.chinese: 我认同你的努力了——但是，可不要就此松懈喔
25.chineseTL: I acknowledge your hard work. B-but, that doesn't mean you can slack off
25.japanese: ーーお主の努力は認めよう。…だ、だがな！これしきのことで怠けてはならぬぞ！
25.japaneseTL: I acknowledge your hard work. H-however, you cannot slack off simply because of that!

26.chinese: 不用那么拼命啦，稍微放慢些步伐、松懈一会儿我也会睁只眼闭只眼喔～想念我的膝枕了？真没办法～
26.chineseTL: There is no need to be this demanding on yourself, if you can slow down your pace and relax a bit, I can pretend to not notice~ You want a lap pillow? It can't be helped...
26.japanese: そう必死にならなくてもいいよ。落ち着いて、少しだけなら休んでも大目に見てあげる。…膝枕が恋しくなった？し、しょうがないな…
26.japaneseTL: There's no need to be so frantic. At ease, Commander. I'll permit you to have at least a short break. You'd like a lap pillow? I-I suppose I have no choice…

27.chinese: 想要被我仰视，现在的你还远远不够呢！嘻嘻～这段旅程就由我来陪伴你吧——直到你成为我触碰不到的伟大之人！
27.chineseTL: Your diligence is still far from worthy of respect! That's why I will always be beside you before then. Until I reach heights I've never been to before...
27.japanese: 尊敬されるにはまだまだ精進が足りぬぞ！…うふふ、だからそうなるまでとことん付き合ってあげる♪――この私でも届かない高みにまで…
27.japaneseTL: Your diligence is not yet worthy of respect! (Giggle) That is why I will remain by your side until then♪ Until you've reached heights not even I achieve…

28.chineseTL: Let's fight together for the sake of humanity
28.japanese: 人類のために、共に戦うぞ！
28.japaneseTL: For the sake of humanity, let's fight together!

29.chineseTL: Keep up your spirits, push forward bravely!
29.japanese: 奮いたて！思うがままに前へ進むがよい！
29.japaneseTL: Pull yourself together! Keep pushing forward!

30.chinese: 不用担心，重樱的大家永远都是你的伙伴~
30.chineseTL: Don't worry, everyone in the Sakura Empire is your companion
30.japanese: 心配せんで良い。重桜の皆はずっとお主の仲間だ
30.japaneseTL: Don't worry too much. Everyone in the Sakura Empire is your companion

31.chinese: 小心呐，这份力量若是使用不慎，可是会反噬自身的
31.chineseTL: Be careful, if you carelessly use this power, it might bite back
31.japanese: 気をつけよ。この力、慎重に使わねば己を蝕むことになるぞ
31.japaneseTL: Be careful. This power, if not used carefully it will bite back

32.chinese: 嗯，我也准备了巧克力呢。别看我这样，姑且也算是皇家出身，就让你见识一下正统的皇家礼仪吧——什么？“赠送巧克力是后面才有的风俗”？这、这样啊……
32.chineseTL: Um, I too prepared chocolates. Despite looking like this, I was still born Royal, so how about a taste of authentic Royal etiquette?——what? "Gifting chocolates is a future tradition"? S, so…
32.japanese: うむ、我もチョコレートを作ったぞ。こう見えてもロイヤル出身、本場の作法やらを披露させてもらうぞ。……なに？「チョコを贈る」のがこっちで後付された風習…だと？そ、そうなのか…
32.japaneseTL: Here, I've made some chocolate as well. I may not look like it, but I am of Royal origin, and I will give you a taste of authentic Royal etiquette. What? Giving chocolate is a custom that originated here, you say…? I-is that so…

33.chinese: 嗯嗯，好像今下的情人节是指“女性把巧克力送给重要的人”的日子啊。指挥官，收下我的巧克力吧！
33.chineseTL: Yes yes, it seems like Valentines Day means "Woman Gifts Chocolate to Her Important Person" nowadays. Commander, take my chocolate!
33.japanese: ふむふむ、どうやら今時のバレンタインは「女性から愛しい方に親愛を込めてチョコを送る」という日になっているらしいな。それを解せない我ではあるまい。どれ、我からのバレンタインチョコレートを受け取るが良い！
33.japaneseTL: Yes yes, it seems like Valentines means "Woman Gifts Chocolate to Her Beloved Person" nowadays. It seems like I understand now. Here, take my Valentines Chocolate!

1.chinese: 整理衣橱的时候发现了令人怀念的服装呢…呵呵，指挥官，要不要准备准备，和我同去开启一段新的旅程呢？
1.chineseTL: I found some nostalgic clothing while organizing my wardrobe... Hehe, Commander, are you ready to start a new journey together with me?
1.japanese: 収納を整理していたら、懐かしい一張羅が出てきたな。どれ…「旅支度済ませて、ボクと共にいざ参ろうぞ」――指揮官、どうだ？
1.japaneseTL: While organizing my storage, I found something nostalgic. Erm... "Preparations complete, join me for a new journey"- Commander, how was it?

2.chinese: 整理衣橱的时候发现了令人怀念的服装呢…呵呵，指挥官，要不要准备准备，和我同去开启一段新的旅程呢？
2.chineseTL: I found some nostalgic clothing while organizing my wardrobe... Hehe, Commander, are you ready to start a new journey together with me?
2.japanese: 収納を整理していたら、懐かしい一張羅が出てきたな。どれ…「旅支度済ませて、ボクと共にいざ参ろうぞ」――指揮官、どうだ？
2.japaneseTL: While organizing my storage, I found something nostalgic. Erm... "Preparations complete, join me for a new journey"- Commander, how was it?

3.chinese: 嗯哼，不错的早晨。吃过早餐了吗？
3.chineseTL: Hmm, good morning. Had breakfast yet?
3.japanese: うむ、良い朝だ。朝餉は済ませたか？
3.japaneseTL: Umu, good morning. Had breakfast yet?

4.chinese: 嗯~真是舒服的风，是个适合启程的日子呢
4.chineseTL: Hmm~Such a gentle breeze, good day to start a journey
4.japanese: ふぅ…心地良い風。これぞ「旅立日和」と謂うものだな
4.japaneseTL: Fuu... Such a gentle breeze. Suitable for a "Departure Day"

5.chinese: 穿上这套衣服，感觉整个人也年轻了许多呢…仿佛正要踏上人生初次的长途之旅的孩子一样呢，呵呵~
5.chineseTL: Wearing these clothes, I feel so much younger... Like a child about to embark on their first journey to faraway lands, hehe~
5.japanese: この服を身にまとうと、なんだか若返ったような気になるな……そう！初めて長旅に出ようとしている子供のような心境だぞ。ふふふ
5.japaneseTL: When I wear these clothes, it somehow feels like I'm getting younger... Oh! Just like a child about to embark on their first journey to faraway lands. Hehehe

6.chinese: 那个时候，许多人都会远渡重洋去皇家留学呢，我们也去吧？虽然皇家的宿舍没几分钟就到了，哈哈
6.chineseTL: At that time, there were many who would study abroad in the Royal Navy, want to go as well? Even though the Royal dormitory is just a few minutes away, haha
6.japanese: 嘗ては留学のために大洋を越え、ロイヤルに渡った者も多かったな。どれ、我とともにロイヤルを見学せぬか？寮ならほんの数分で着くぞ。ははは
6.japaneseTL: In the past, there were many who crossed the oceans to study abroad in the Royal Navy. Would you like to go with me? Their dormitory is just a few minutes away though. Hahaha

7.chinese: 对于那个时代虽然还是多少有些留恋，不过这只舰队才是我现在的归宿呢
7.chineseTL: Although I still feel nostalgic about that era, this fleet is my home now
7.japanese: あの時代にはまだ少し懐かしさを覚えておるが……今はこの艦隊こそが我の居場所だ
7.japaneseTL: I still feel a bit nostalgic about that era but... This fleet is my home now

8.chinese: 喂喂！别闹了，行李都要倒掉了——
8.chineseTL: Oi oi! Stop messing around, the luggage is falling apart-
8.japanese: こら！いじくりまわすでない！旅鞄（かばん）が倒れそうになったであろうが……
8.japaneseTL: Hey! Stop messing around! The luggage is falling apart...

9.chinese: 孩子们都平安回来了吗，很好很好
9.chineseTL: The kids returned safely, good good
9.japanese: 皆無事に帰還しておるな。大儀であった

10.chinese: 我在想，若我还是学生，在樱花飞舞的季节中遇到你，然后与你度过漫长的时光，似乎也不错呢
10.chineseTL: I was just thinking, if I was still a student and met you under the fluttering petals of the Sakura blooming season, and spending an everlasting moment with you... Sounds good
10.japanese: まだ学生だった私が桜の季節にお主と出会って、そして共に何度も四季を過ごしてゆく――こういうのも、ふふ、結構良いのかもな
10.japaneseTL: If I was still a student and met Milord during the Sakura blooming season, to then spend many seasons thereafter together... Such scenery, hehe, sounds good

1.chinese: 又到了樱花盛放的季节了啊，时间过得真快呢……咳咳，指挥官，一道去赏樱如何？
1.chineseTL: Once again it's Sakura blooming season, time flies by quickly... Ahem, Commander, how does flower viewing together sound?
1.japanese: そろそろ桜が咲く季節か、時の流れとは早いものだ……コホン、指揮官、どれ、我と一緒にお花見でも行かぬか？
1.japaneseTL: It's about time for the Sakura blooming season, the flow of time is fast... Ahem, Commander, how about flower viewing with me?

2.chinese: 又到了樱花盛放的季节了啊，时间过得真快呢……咳咳，指挥官，一道去赏樱如何？
2.chineseTL: Once again it's Sakura blooming season, time flies by quickly... Ahem, Commander, how does flower viewing together sound?
2.japanese: そろそろ桜が咲く季節か、時の流れとは早いものだ……コホン、指揮官、どれ、我と一緒にお花見でも行かぬか？
2.japaneseTL: It's about time for the Sakura blooming season, the flow of time is fast... Ahem, Commander, how about flower viewing with me?

3.chinese: 嗯哼，天气晴朗，风和日丽，正是赏花的好时候！
3.chineseTL: Uh-huh, clear skies, gentle breeze, beautiful weather, it's the perfect time for flower viewing!
3.japanese: うむ、天気清朗、暖風快晴――「お花見日和」とはこういうものだな
3.japaneseTL: Umu, the sky is clear, the breeze is gentle- It's perfect for "Flower Viewing Day"

4.chinese: 不管在什么时代，樱花的盛放都一样美丽呢
4.chineseTL: No matter what era it is, Sakura blooming is always beautiful
4.japanese: どの時代でも、咲き誇る桜は変わらず綺麗なものだ
4.japaneseTL: In any era, Sakura blooming is always beautiful

5.chinese: 哦哦，比叡啊。准备筵席真是辛苦了。也来和指挥官一起赏花吧！
5.chineseTL: Oh oh, it's Hiei. Good work preparing the banquet. Let's go flower viewing with the Commander together!
5.japanese: おお比叡か。酒肴と場所の手配、大儀であった。お主も同席して指揮官と共に楽しむが良いぞ！
5.japaneseTL: Ooh it's Hiei. The prepations for the picnic spot and sake, good work. Come for flower viewing with Milord as well!

6.chinese: 长门，一个人躲着怎么能跟大家交流呢？你看陆奥和其他几个大七聊的多开心啊
6.chineseTL: Nagato, if you keep hiding alone how will you socialize with the others? Look at how happy Mutsu is chatting with the other Big Seven
6.japanese: 長門、一人で隠れていては輪に入れぬではないか。陸奥がほかのビッグセブンたちと歓談しておるぞ？
6.japaneseTL: Nagato, if you keep hiding alone you won't be able to open up. Mutsu seems to be having a good time chatting with the other Big Seven over there?

7.chinese: 果然只有像这样看到盛放的樱花，才会让人有“春天来了”的实感呢
7.chineseTL: Sure enough, only by watching the Sakura bloom will make people feel "Spring has arrived"
7.japanese: お花見の時は、苦悩葛藤を忘れ、身も心もしっかり休むが良い
7.japaneseTL: When I go on flower viewing, it makes me forget all my troubles, my body and heart also get to take a good rest

8.chinese: 怎样，我这身穿起来也很适合吧？尽管夸好了，哈哈哈
8.chineseTL: How is it, doesn't it suit me? Keep praising me, hahaha
8.japanese: 指揮官、我…いいや、私はこういう格好も似合うであろう？さて、惚れ直すが良いぞ、ははは
8.japaneseTL: Commander, I... No, I look good like this? Let's rekindle our love, hahaha

9.chinese: 真拿你没办法啊…只能撒娇一会哦？
9.chineseTL: You can't be helped... I'll let you indulge for a bit, ok?
9.japanese: しょ、しょうがないな……少しだけだぞ？
9.japaneseTL: I-it can't be helped... Just for a bit, ok?

10.chinese: 花期不等人。在樱花凋谢之前将此番盛景及时收于眼底，才是风流所在啊，哈哈
10.chineseTL: The flowering season does not wait. Before the Sakura fade away, make sure to remember this merry scenery, haha
10.japanese: 花期は人を待たぬ。散らぬうちにしっかり目に収めるのが風流だぞ。ははは
10.japaneseTL: The flowering season does not wait. Before it fades away, make sure to remember fondly this merry scenery. Hahaha
